name: White silly space
description:
You wake up in a big white room and you have to find an answer about 'how do you get in here?' and 'how do you get out from here?' with someone who call themselves a scientist.

A visual-novel game with 8-bit/pixel art style that you can interact with objects and continue the mystery story.

__________

Before play, this game have:

  • content about death
  •  some unskipable scene that might make you feel uncomfortable

__________

* If you found any error or want to talk about the story after finish playing this game, feel free to comment below! :] - nobii

__________

Tips:

White Silly Space have only 1 ending. So there's no save, load button.
